results.title: [docs] Update documentation for trial --dry-run flag
results.author: github-actions[bot]
results.impact_rationale: Documentation for recently added feature (trial --dry-run). Moderate impact as it helps users understand new functionality.
results.urgency_rationale: Recent PR (< 4 hours old), documents new feature from #13804. High urgency to keep docs in sync.
results.quality_rationale: Good description, CI pending, not passing yet. Automated PR with clear context.
results.action_explanation: Documentation for new feature should be fast-tracked to keep docs current. Low risk, clear changes, automated workflow.

results.title: [instructions] Sync github-agentic-workflows.md with v0.42.2 documentation
results.author: github-actions[bot]
results.impact_rationale: Critical instruction file updates including secrets field documentation and security warnings. Important for agent functionality.
results.urgency_rationale: Syncing instructions with latest docs (v0.42.2). Moderate urgency to maintain consistency.
results.quality_rationale: Good description, CI pending. Automated PR with validation checklist completed.
results.action_explanation: Instructions updates should be fast-tracked to keep agent instructions synchronized with documentation. Low risk.

results.title: [log] Add debug logging to 4 Go files for better troubleshooting
results.author: github-actions[bot]
results.impact_rationale: Adds debug logging to internal workflow processing. Moderate impact for troubleshooting but non-functional change.
results.urgency_rationale: Enhancement for debugging. Low urgency, no blocking issues.
results.quality_rationale: Good description, follows logging guidelines. CI pending. Automated PR with clear checklist.
results.action_explanation: Debug logging enhancement. Low risk, good for batch review with similar infrastructure improvements.

results.title: [jsweep] Clean add_labels.cjs
results.author: github-actions[bot]
results.impact_rationale: Code quality improvement, no functional changes. Low impact, improves maintainability.
results.urgency_rationale: Code cleanup, non-urgent. Draft status indicates not ready for immediate merge.
results.quality_rationale: Excellent description with before/after examples. Test coverage noted (21 test cases). CI pending.
results.action_explanation: Refactoring for code clarity. Draft status suggests review needed. Good candidate for batch review with other refactorings.

results.title: Add video embedding support via astro-embed
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: New documentation feature for video embedding. Medium impact, enhances docs capabilities.
results.urgency_rationale: Nice-to-have feature, not urgent. Firewall blocked external domains during build.
results.quality_rationale: Good description with examples. Draft status, unstable mergeable state, firewall issues noted.
results.action_explanation: New feature for docs. Medium priority but draft status and firewall issues need resolution. Defer until stable and CI passes.

results.title: Fix Serena container selection for Go language support
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: Fixes Go language support for 15 workflows using Serena. High impact bug fix for core functionality.
results.urgency_rationale: Fixes failing workflows (issue #13857). Moderate urgency, affects multiple workflows.
results.quality_rationale: Good description, fixes known issue. Draft status, unstable state, many files changed. Previously triaged (has PR labels).
results.action_explanation: Critical bug fix for Go support in Serena MCP. Already triaged once. Despite draft status, should be fast-tracked once CI passes and reviewed. Impacts 15 workflows.

batch-refactor-001.description: Code quality improvements and logging enhancements
